          <title>
            <string language="sl">Janko in Metka - priprava na ogled opere</string>
            <string language="en">Hansel and Gretel - preparation for opera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hansel und Gretel - Vorbereitung für Oper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hansel et Gretel - préparation pour l'opéra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hansel e Gretel - preparação para a ópera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hansel e Gretel - preparazione per l'opera</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Hansel και Gretel - προετοιμασία για την όπερα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hansel y Gretel - preparación para la ópera</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učna priprava za kulturni dan - opera Janko in Metka (dejavnosti, predlog za izvedbo, učno gradivo, note, spletne povezave). Prispevek je smiselno uporabiti še s prispevkoma: Janko in Metka - domače branje v 3. razredu in Opera Janko in Metka - predstavitev.</string>
            <string language="en">How to organize cultural day - visit of opera house and watching Hänsel und Gretel by Engelbert Humperdinck.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">opera</string>
            <string language="en">opera</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="sl">janko in metka</string>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">engelbert humperdinck</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie man kulturellen Tag - Besuch des Oper Hauses 
und des überwachenden Hänsel und Gretel durch Engelbert Humperdinck 
organisiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment organiser le jour culturel - visite du 
théatre de l'$opéra et de l'und d'observation de Hänsel Gretel par 
Engelbert Humperdinck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como organizar o dia cultural - visita da casa de
ópera e do und prestando atenção Gretel de Hänsel por Engelbert 
Humperdinck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come organizzare giorno culturale - chiamata 
della casa di opera e del und guardante Gretel di Hänsel da Engelbert
Humperdinck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς να οργανώσει την πολιτιστική ημέρα - επίσκεψη του
σπιτιού και της προσοχής Hδnsel und Gretel οπερών από 
Engelbert Humperdinck.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo ordenar el día cultural - visita de la 
casa de ópera y del und Gretel de Hänsel que mira de Engelbert 
Humperdinck.</string>
          </description>
